channel.title: Searching good server (al who have server look this)
channel.description:
Hi me and my friend (i have played like 2h (i think..) and he have been player 1 year +- 2 month i have experiences being admin,mod (like 20+ times..) friendly to and help ppls if they need it ) searching
good server with :
should have like 10 + ppl online (but it isnt veri importand) pretty slow xp (make 1 skill 99 2-3h.. (1.5h is good to) it should have many working skills (if owner dont know how add i can help him..) free mod spots (if owner found out i help other ... then he make me mod i mean not like this : pls make me mod..) no mod/admin spot selling in this server (i dont come if it is) should have skillcapes
your post should look like :
server name : server forum (if it have) : features
feature1 feature2... admins : mods:
